title: Blackhoodie Meetup
description: We are an international, free, women only info sec/reverse engineering - open for everyone who just wants a place to start or learn more. Beginners and experts are super welcome! It is a place, where attendees feel encouraged to grow skills without pressure, where they can be themselves without having to compete. A lot of our attendees haven’t stuck their noses into security research before they joined the bootcamp.
